mapper.select: SELECT t.id, tag_name, COUNT(aat.memory_id) AS count FROM t_tag t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.id AS memory_id, at.tag_id AS tag_id FROM t_memory_tag at LEFT JOIN t_memory a ON at.memory_id = a.id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 and a.user_id = #{userId} ) aat ON t.id = aat.tag_id where t.user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY t.id

SELECT t.id, tag_name, COUNT(aat.memory_id) AS count FROM t_tag t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.id AS memory_id, at.tag_id AS tag_id FROM t_memory_tag at LEFT JOIN t_memory a ON at.memory_id = a.id WHERE a.is_delete = 0 ) aat ON t.id = aat.tag_id GROUP BY t.id LIMIT 0, 10
SELECT tag_name FROM t_tag t JOIN t_memory_tag at ON t.id = at.tag_id WHERE memory_id = #{memoryId}
